file_content.text: Good work. Now Peblak must wait for a time to act.
Peblak is waiting for that datapad.
Were you trying to get my attention?
Of course. You do many great things for Nem'ro the Meritorious. Now everyone wants your attention.
Nem'ro's engineering corps works long hours. Many days. Finds way to introduce random variances in hated Fa'athra's automated factories. All is here on datapad.
Random variances in an automated factory structure. Untraceable because there's no pattern, but productivity comes to a screeching halt?
You're talking about sabotage.
You very smart pirate.
I assume you need this datapad safely delivered somewhere?
Who gets the information?
Very perceptive. Nem'ro hires good talent.
I lost you right about the time you started talking about the things and the stuff.
Random what now?
I make simple talk, then.
Let's talk credits.
Payment on delivery.
This datapad goes into hands of Peblak in worker's camp outside Rust Yards. Datapad encrypted so only he can read. Then Peblak pay you.
Sure. Sooner the better.
I'll see this Peblak.
Great, great. You will know Peblak. He ugliest Ugnaught on Hutta!
No deliveries. [Refuse quest]
Fine, fine. Go then.
Engineering is not so dangerous as your work.
